name: Rusty Dagger
description: A worn and rusty dagger with a slightly chipped blade.
looks: The rusty dagger is small and compact, with a tarnished metal handle and a blade that shows signs of wear and rust. The blade is slightly chipped in some places.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Heavy gauntlets made from steel to provide excellent protection for the hands.
looks: The gauntlets are made of solid steel and have a metal plate covering the back of the hand. They extend up to the forearm and have straps for a secure fit.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic sword made of iron.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a single cutting edge. The handle is wrapped in leather for better grip.

name: Iron Sword
description: A basic sword made of iron.
looks: The iron sword has a straight blade with a single cutting edge. The hilt is made of leather wrapped around the tang, providing a firm grip.

special_weapon_skils.swordfighting: Grants a bonus to Swordfighting skill when used.

name: Steel Shield
description: A sturdy shield made of steel, providing excellent protection.
looks: The steel shield is a rounded shape, with a smooth surface and a silver finish. It has a grip on the back and a central boss for added strength.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Heavy-duty gauntlets made from sturdy steel, providing excellent hand protection.
looks: The steel gauntlets are made of thick steel plates with intricate engravings. They have reinforced knuckles and protective guards for the fingers.

name: Leather Boots
description: A pair of sturdy leather boots for adventuring.
looks: The leather boots are made from thick and durable leather. They have a low heel and laces along the front for a secure fit.

name: Steel Longsword
description: A longsword forged from high-quality steel.
looks: The steel longsword has a sharp, polished blade with a straight, single-edged design. The hilt is wrapped in black leather, providing a comfortable grip. The pommel is adorned with a decorative emblem.

name: Elven Bow
description: A finely-crafted bow made from the wood of the sacred elven trees.
looks: The Elven Bow has a graceful and elegant design, with intricate carvings of leaves and vines along its length. The wood has a natural light brown color, and the bowstring is made from enchanted silk.

special_weapon_skils.archery: Increases damage and accuracy with bows.

name: Steel Gauntlets
description: Heavy gauntlets made of durable steel.
looks: The steel gauntlets are made of thick steel plates, covering the hands and extending up to the forearms. They have reinforced knuckles and adjustable leather straps for a secure fit.
